text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "VbaiPlanDefinitionAcousticTasksNeuroExample"

Profile: Vbai Plan Definition

url: https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/PlanDefinition/VbaiPlanDefinitionAcousticTasksNeuroExample

version: 1.5.1

title: Acoustic Tasks Neuro Cohort Protocol

status: active

date: 2023-07-31

publisher: KinD Lab

contact: KinD Lab: http://fhir.kindlab.sickkids.ca

description: This is a plandefinition for Acoustic Tasks Neuro cohort protocol

action

prefix: 1.8 Task 1

title: Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA Test)

description: Have participant complete MoCA Test

definition: MoCA Questionnaire

action

prefix: 1.8 Task 2

title: Word-colour Stroop:

description: You will be shown a word (one of 5 colour words - red, green, blue, brown, purple; such as ‘blue’, or a baseline stimulus, ‘oooo’), which is displayed in a congruent or incongruent colour (one of 5 colour stimuli). You have to name the colour in which the word is displayed. (no time limit) 

definition: Stroop Questionniare for Neuro Cohort

action

prefix: 1.8 Task 3

title: Productive vocabulary link:

description: You will be shown a target word. You will have to provide a definition for it (no time limit).

definition: Vocabulary Questionniare

action

prefix: 1.8 Task 4

title: Random item generation / semantic fluency link:

description: You will have to speak a series of (I) random, non-repeating letters or numbers, or (ii) items from a given category (e.g., cities, animals, etc.), with the goal of maximizing the number of items. (time limit: 60 seconds). 

definition: Random Item Generation Questionniare

action

prefix: 1.8 Task 5

title: Winograd schemas link

description: Read each sentence, and answer the question by selecting one of the options

definition: Winograd Questionnaire

title: Acoustic Tasks Neuro Cohort Protocol
description: This is a plandefinition for Acoustic Tasks Neuro cohort protocol
